thread.title: PWB Peeps: Moonday Furbutts and Warmz!
thread.title_full: PWB Peeps: Moonday Furbutts and Warmz!

author: @TheMartiScott
title: PWB Peeps: Moonday Furbutts and Warmz!
text: As most of you know, it’s been so very cold in so many places. And since today is a day off for many, it’s probably a good idea to cuddle up and stay warm while we visit together. Plus….naps are a good thing! Floof can’t believe the snow. pic.twitter.com/4kqyKpP6xJ— A Cat Named Bitches (@BitchestheCat) January 9, 2024 Floof can’t believe the snow. pic.twitter.com/4kqyKpP6xJ A gentle reminder of how we do things: 🐱🐶🐦 Do not troll the diary. If you hate pootie diaries, leave now. No harm, no foul. Please do share pics of your fur kids! If you have health/behavior issues with your pets, feel free to bring it to the community. Pooties are cats; Woozles are dogs. Birds... are birds! Peeps are people. Whatever happens in the outer blog STAYS in the outer blog. If you’re having “issues” with another Kossack, keep it “out there.” This is a place to relax and play; please treat it accordingly. There are some pics we never post: snakes, creepy crawlies, any and all photos that depict or encourage human cruelty toward animals. These are considered “out of bounds” and will not be tolerated. If we alert you to it, please remember that we do have phobic peeps who react strongly to them. If you keep posting banned pics...well then...the Tigress will have to take matters in hand. Or, paw. Kitty is not messing around! 😁😁😁 Happy Sunday. pic.twitter.com/ynK0tsZmee— Maui Girl (@dcc31117) January 14, 2024 Kitty is not messing around! 😁😁😁 Happy Sunday. pic.twitter.com/ynK0tsZmee .. 🍲🐈 . |. |. 🙄 | pic.twitter.com/8gBg4znGnl— Urbanartist (@Urbanartist2) January 14, 2024 .. 🍲🐈 . |. |. 🙄 | pic.twitter.com/8gBg4znGnl Sheep dog clears traffic jam pic.twitter.com/Gj2wKP3mja— 𝕐o̴g̴ (@Yoda4ever) January 12, 2024 Sheep dog clears traffic jam pic.twitter.com/Gj2wKP3mja Your earworm for the day. And since I wanted it to be fun….and have a buncha woozles, which have been missing of late…..here we are. Hope you enjoyed it. Hope you are all safe and well and warm. snorffles, scritchies, smoooochies, an’ purrrrs!!! I know today’s offering is Tweet heavy, but there were just so many cool things to share!
